A '''Supremacist''' is a person whom believes that their [[race]], [[gender]], [[species]] or [[religion]] is the supreme race, gender species or religion. A person whom believes that a particular race, gender, species or religion is inferior to the rest could also be considered a supremacist.
Generally speaking people and groups that believe this have a hard time fitting into society and on occasion are known to do terrible things to groups they dislike. For example, the [[Nazi]]s were an [[Aryan Race]] Supremacist group and held that the Germans were the '[[master race]]'. They then set out to murder or enslave everyone else. See: [[holocaust]].
'''Supremacist Groups'''
*[[Ku Klux Klan]] *[[Nazi]]s *[[Neo-Nazism]] *[[Nation of Islam]] *[[German-American Bund]]
'''Supremacists and Terrorist organizations'''
Although not specifically considered to be supremacist groups. Terrorist Organizations such as [[Al-Qaeda]] and groups occasionally associated with Terrorism such as the [[Palestinian Liberation Organization]] display traits often associated with Supremacist groups. Examples of these traits are the spreading of [[Anti-Semitic]] propaganda and advocacy of religious states.
However sometimes groups such as these try to hide behind political causes. Making them difficult to identify as supremacist groups.
